name: Prince Ali Rescue
Start point: Hassan in the Al Kharid palace.
Description: Prince Ali of Al Kharid has been kidnapped by the scheming Lady Keli. You are hired by his father to stage a rescue mission.

Items required: Soft clay (Mine clay and use a water source on it)
Yellow dye (Bring 2 Onions and 5 coins to Aggie in Draynor Village)
Redberries (Found west of Varrock south-east mine)
Ashes (Obtained after a fire burns out)
Pot of flour (Use wheat on the hopper at the top of a windmill, operate it, then collect from the bin on the ground floor)
Bucket of water (Use an empty Bucket on a water source)
Pink skirt (Bought from Thessalia's Fine Clothes in Varrock)
Bronze bar (Smelt Copper ore and Tin ore in a furnace)
Rope (Bought from Ned in Draynor Village for 15 coins, or requires 4 balls of wool if asking him to make one during the quest)

Recommended: Teleport runes/methods to Varrock and Al Kharid.

substeps: Speak to Hassan in the Al Kharid palace.
Speak to Osman, the palace spy master, located just outside the palace entrance to the north-west.

substeps.caption: Osman outside the Al Kharid palace.

substeps: Osman will tell you to speak to Leela, his daughter, in Draynor Village.

Walkthrough.step: Gathering the Disguise and Key Imprint
substeps: Travel to Draynor Village and speak to Leela, located north of the wheat field.
Speak to Aggie, the witch in the house west of the Draynor Village bank. Ask her to make Yellow dye (requires 2 onions, 5 coins) and Skin paste (requires redberries, ashes, flour, bucket of water).
Speak to Ned in the house east of the Draynor Village bank. Ask him to make a Wig (requires 3 balls of wool). Buy a Rope if you don't have one.
Go to the jail building south-east of Draynor Village.
Speak to Lady Keli. Use the following chat options:
- "I have heard of your work."
- "What is your latest plan then?"
- "You must have been very skilful..."
- "Are you sure they will not try to rescue him?"
- "Could I see the key for a moment?" (Requires Soft Clay in inventory)
- "Could I touch the key for a moment?" (You will automatically make an imprint)
Return to Osman in Al Kharid with the Key imprint and a Bronze bar.
Osman will tell you to collect the key from Leela.
Go back to Draynor Village and speak to Leela to receive the Bronze key.
Ensure you have the Pink skirt, Wig, Skin paste, Bronze key, Rope, and 3 Beers.
Go back to the jail building near Draynor Village.

substeps.caption: Prince Ali in his jail cell.

substeps: Talk to the Guard outside the jail cell. Offer him a beer.
Keep talking to him until you've given him all 3 beers and he passes out drunk.
Use the Rope on Lady Keli to tie her up.
Use the Bronze key on the jail door to unlock it.
Speak to Prince Ali. He will automatically take the disguise items (Wig, Skirt, Skin Paste) and escape.
Return to Hassan in the Al Kharid palace to claim your reward.
